availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac A. Lattin (New Orleans, Louisiana, agent )

body.p: New Orleans, Louisiana, agent. Agent for Mr. and Mrs. Carter of the Carter & Wells curiosity show in 1860. Agent for the State of Louisiana in 1860. Charged by the governor of Louisiana to retrieve two fugitives from the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
"Recorder Summers' Court," The New Orleans Crescent (New Orleans, La.), Mar. 30, 1860, p. 1.
"The Show People Again," The New Orleans Crescent (New Orleans, La.), Mar. 23, 1860, p. 1.
